import React from "react"; import { useEffect, useRef, useState } from "react"; function MainKonten(){ const textAreaRef = useRef(null); const [value, setValue] = useState(); const resizeTextArea = () => { if (!textAreaRef.current) { return; } textAreaRef.current.style.height = "auto"; // will not work without this! textAreaRef.current.style.height = `${textAreaRef.current.scrollHeight}px`; }; useEffect(() => { resizeTextArea(); window.addEventListener("resize", resizeTextArea); }, []) return (
) }; export default MainKonten;
